quotes: Minister of Cabinet Affairs (2006–Present)
On 11 February 2006, UAE President Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan issued a presidential decree appointing the new UAE cabinet, which included Al Gergawi as Minister of Cabinet Affairs
Founded in 2004, Dubai Holding was created to manage the extensive portfolio of businesses and investments of the government of Dubai.
Al Gergawi founded Dubai Holding and oversaw its growth and strategic direction until 2017.
Initially established in 2013 as the Government Summit, an annual forum focused on the future of governance
it was renamed the World Government Summit in 2015 to reflect its expanded global scope.
The museum, which opened in 2022, is designed to be an incubator for ideas
